title: [Large-scale] Mobile-Based Elementary Social Studies Language Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone proficiency and understanding of elementary social studies concepts
context.additional_context: In-service elementary teachers acquiring methods to simultaneously enhance learners' language expression skills and understanding of social studies content using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately use over 200 elementary social studies vocabulary and expressions in context using mobile applications
Learners can apply methods for designing language learning activities in real classroom environments through VR simulations with over 80% performance proficiency
Learners can execute a process of diagnosing and providing feedback on individual language proficiency levels using mobile-based formative assessment tools at least three times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
